attributes.additional_details:
M.B.E or other medal for keeping going.
This brought me to tears of all the pain the families went through. Children bullied at school etc for parents being wrongly accused.
attributes.background: I believe Alan Bates deserves a medal for bringing to light all the sub post masters have been through. Now finally hopefully they can get some justice. But the pain anguish and all they have been through will never be able to be repaid.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
